entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:50 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 03:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
